original: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁na pīti saha gat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na pīti sahagato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi

original: Nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁na na pīti saha gat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na na pīti sahagato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi

original: Napītisahagatañca nanapītisahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na pīti saha gat añca ▁na na pīti saha gat añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na pīti sahagato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
